name: NOTION Score
summary: Learn about .NTN files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: VirtuosoWorks NOTION is a now-discontinued scorewriter that allowed composers to create, edit, and play back musical scores. Most notably, NOTION used audio samples recorded by the London Symphony Orchestra, specifically for use with NOTION, to play back users' scores. This gave NOTION's playback a realistic, live performance-esque sound.

NOTION saved the scores that composers created as NTN files. When opened in NOTION, these scores appear as editable sheet music, consisting of a score title, author name, measures, notes, rests, tempo notation, and other musical notation.

instructions: You can open an NTN file with VirtuosoWorks NOTION (Windows, Mac), to view, edit, and play back the score it contains. However, NOTION is no longer available for download or purchase. If you do not already have access to NOTION, it is unlikely that you'll be able to open your NTN file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
